route_0_airport_to_hotel.from: Chongqing Jiangbei International Airport Terminal 3 (重庆江北国际机场T3航站楼)
route_0_airport_to_hotel.to: Raffles City InterContinental Hotel (来福士洲际酒店)
route_0_airport_to_hotel.route: Airport expressway via Yubei District, crossing Yangtze River via Dongshuimen Bridge to Yuzhong Peninsula
route_0_airport_to_hotel.notes: Flight HU718 from Paris CDG T1 lands at 4:40am. Allow 20 minutes for customs, baggage, then 30-minute taxi to hotel. Early morning traffic light at 5am. Total cost includes airport surcharge. Driver may speak limited English - have hotel address ready in Chinese.

flight_info.origin_airport: Paris Charles de Gaulle Airport Terminal 1

route_1_hotel_to_observation_deck.from: Raffles City InterContinental Hotel (来福士洲际酒店)
route_1_hotel_to_observation_deck.to: Raffles City Observation Deck (来福士观景台)
route_1_hotel_to_observation_deck.route: Walk within Raffles City complex from hotel lobby to observation deck elevator
route_1_hotel_to_observation_deck.notes: Same building complex. Early morning visit at 07:00 after luggage storage and rest. Hotel check-in not available until afternoon, but luggage storage available 24/7.

route_1_5_breakfast_at_raffles.from: Raffles City Observation Deck (来福士观景台)
route_1_5_breakfast_at_raffles.to: Raffles City Mall Food Court (来福士购物中心美食广场)
route_1_5_breakfast_at_raffles.route: Breakfast at mall food court after observation deck visit
route_1_5_breakfast_at_raffles.notes: BREAKFAST ADDED - 08:00-09:00 at Raffles City Mall Food Court (¥45 per person). Chongqing xiaomian, steamed buns, soy milk. Multiple options available in mall food court. Convenient location.

route_2_observation_deck_to_huguang_guil.from: Raffles City Mall Food Court (来福士购物中心美食广场)
route_2_observation_deck_to_huguang_guil.route: Walk southwest via Xinhua Road (新华路) → Shaanxi Road (陕西路) 376m → South via Jialingjiang Binjiang Road (嘉陵江滨江路) → Arrive Huguang Guild Hall.
route_2_observation_deck_to_huguang_guil.notes: USER REQUEST - WALKING ROUTE: 1.0km walk (14 minutes) from Raffles City to Huguang Guild Hall. Scenic riverside walk along Jialingjiang Binjiang Road. Depart 09:00 after breakfast, arrive 09:14 for 09:15-10:30 visit. Taxi alternative: 3.3km in 7 minutes for ¥15 if tired.

route_3_huguang_guild_hall_to_hongyadong.to: Hongyadong Folk Culture District (洪崖洞民俗风貌区)
route_3_huguang_guild_hall_to_hongyadong.route: Taxi via Changjiang Binjiang Road (长江滨江路), Xinhua Road (新华路), Minzu Road (民族路) to Hongyadong.
route_3_huguang_guild_hall_to_hongyadong.notes: USER REQUEST - TAXI: Changed from Bus 181路 back to TAXI per user preference. 4.2km, 12 minutes, ¥15. Depart 10:30, arrive 10:42 for 11:00-11:30 visit. More convenient than bus with luggage. Alternative: Bus 181路 (18 minutes, ¥2) or walk 1.2km (20 minutes, free).

route_4_hongyadong_to_nie_caifu.from: Hongyadong Folk Culture District (洪崖洞民俗风貌区)
route_4_hongyadong_to_nie_caifu.to: Nie Fa Cai Chongqing Jianghu Cuisine (聂发财重庆江湖菜)
route_4_hongyadong_to_nie_caifu.route: Very short walk from Hongyadong to nearby restaurant (大溪巷28号)
route_4_hongyadong_to_nie_caifu.notes: Depart 11:30, arrive 11:32 for 12:00-13:30 lunch. Only 110m walk!

route_5_nie_caifu_to_xiayao_li.from: Nie Fa Cai Chongqing Jianghu Cuisine (聂发财重庆江湖菜)
route_5_nie_caifu_to_xiayao_li.to: Xiayao Li & Longmenhao Old Street (下浩里&龙门浩老街)
route_5_nie_caifu_to_xiayao_li.route: Walk to Xiaoshizi Station (小什字) → Metro Line 6 to Shangxinjie Station (上新街) → Walk to Xiayao Li
route_5_nie_caifu_to_xiayao_li.notes: Depart 13:30, arrive 14:02 for 14:30-16:00 visit. Metro with walk, total 32 minutes. NO 2-hour taxi - this is CORRECT route!

route_6_xiayao_li_to_laojun_dong.from: Xiayao Li & Longmenhao Old Street (下浩里&龙门浩老街)
route_6_xiayao_li_to_laojun_dong.to: Laojun Dong Taoist Temple (老君洞道观)
route_6_xiayao_li_to_laojun_dong.route: Walk 204m east → Tushan Road (涂山路) 821m → Southwest 109m → Longhuang Road (龙黄路) 99m → Qianqu Road (前驱路) 389m → Continue uphill to temple
route_6_xiayao_li_to_laojun_dong.notes: USER REQUEST - WALKING ROUTE: 2.5km uphill walk (34 minutes) from Xiayao Li to Laojun Dong. Scenic route through Nanshan area. Depart 16:00, arrive 16:34 for 17:00-17:45 visit. Taxi alternative: 7.5km in 15 minutes for ¥20 if tired from walking.

route_7_laojun_dong_to_taoyuan_hotpot.from: Laojun Dong Taoist Temple (老君洞道观)
route_7_laojun_dong_to_taoyuan_hotpot.to: Taoyuan Hotpot - Night View with Folk Music (桃园火锅·看夜景听民谣)
route_7_laojun_dong_to_taoyuan_hotpot.route: Walk 182m west → Southwest 55m → Northwest 413m → Northwest 171m → Northwest 83m → Qianqu Road (前驱路) 342m → Continue to Taoyuan Hotpot
route_7_laojun_dong_to_taoyuan_hotpot.notes: USER REQUEST - WALKING ROUTE: 1.5km downhill walk (20 minutes) from Laojun Dong to Taoyuan Hotpot. Short walk within Nanshan area. Depart 17:45, arrive 18:05. RESERVATION RECOMMENDED: Taoyuan Hotpot (rating 4.7, ¥95 per person, open 11:00-24:00 during Spring Festival). Call ahead if possible. Taxi alternative: 3.5km in 11 minutes for ¥15.

route_8_taoyuan_hotpot_to_drone_show.from: Taoyuan Hotpot - Night View with Folk Music (桃园火锅·看夜景听民谣)
route_8_taoyuan_hotpot_to_drone_show.to: Changjiahui Shopping Park (长嘉汇购物公园)
route_8_taoyuan_hotpot_to_drone_show.route: Taxi via Haitangxin New Street (海棠溪新街) → Longmen Road (龙门路) → Nanbin Road (南滨路) → Changjiahui
route_8_taoyuan_hotpot_to_drone_show.notes: USER FIX - TAXI RESTORED: 84-minute walk after dinner unrealistic. 3.8km taxi (9 minutes, ¥20) is practical. Depart 19:45 after 90-minute dinner, arrive 19:54 for 20:30-21:00 drone show. Allows rest after dinner. Taoyuan Hotpot dinner extended from 45min to 90min (18:05-19:45) per user request.

route_9_drone_show_to_spa.from: Changjiahui Shopping Park (长嘉汇购物公园)
route_9_drone_show_to_spa.to: Guanyuan Zudao Wellness - Jiefangbei (观远足道养生-解放碑店)
route_9_drone_show_to_spa.route: Late night taxi from Nanbin Road via Chaotianmen Yangtze River Bridge, Huanghuayuan Interchange to Jiefangbei.
route_9_drone_show_to_spa.notes: Depart 21:00 after drone show (20:30-21:00), arrive 21:15 for 21:30-23:30 spa. 9.4km, 15 minutes. Cross Yangtze River Bridge. After spa, return to hotel for check-in (5 min walk or ¥10 taxi).

flight_info.route: Paris CDG T1 → Chongqing CKG T3
flight_info.notes: International flight arrival. Total journey from landing to hotel: ~50 minutes (20min customs/baggage + 30min taxi). Early arrival allows full day activities.

day_1_transportation_summary.notes: DAY 1 TRANSPORTATION FIXES COMPLETED (2026-02-12): (1) BREAKFAST ADDED: 08:00-09:00 at Raffles City Mall Food Court (¥45, same location as observation deck). (2) HUGUANG TO HONGYADONG: Changed from taxi (12min, ¥15) to Bus 181路 (18min, ¥2) - No metro available, bus is cheaper option. (3) XIAYAO LI TO LAOJUN DONG: Changed from taxi (15min, ¥20) to WALKING (34min, free) - 2.5km scenic uphill walk, user requested. (4) LAOJUN DONG TO TAOYUAN HOTPOT: Changed from taxi (11min, ¥15) to WALKING (20min, free) - 1.5km downhill walk, user requested. (5) TAOYUAN TO DRONE SHOW: Changed from walking (84min, free) back to TAXI (9min, ¥20) - 84min post-dinner walk unrealistic per user feedback. (6) TAOYUAN HOTPOT DINNER: Extended from 45min to 90min (18:05-19:45). (7) LAOJUN DONG RESERVATION: Not required - walk-in temple, open 08:00-17:30. Complete route-by-route breakdown with 10 segments: (0) Airport T3 to Hotel (taxi 23.3km, 30min, ¥80), (1.5) Breakfast at Raffles City (08:00-09:00, ¥45) - NEW, (2) Raffles City to Huguang Guild Hall (taxi 3.3km, 7min, ¥15), (3) Huguang Guild Hall to Hongyadong (Bus 181路 18min, ¥2) - METRO RESEARCH COMPLETE - NO METRO AVAILABLE, (4) Hongyadong to Nie Caifu (walk 110m, 2min, free), (5) Nie Caifu to Xiayao Li (Metro Line 6, 32min, ¥3), (6) Xiayao Li to Laojun Dong (WALK 2.5km, 34min, free) - USER REQUESTED, (7) Laojun Dong to Taoyuan Hotpot (WALK 1.5km, 20min, free) - USER REQUESTED, (8) Taoyuan Hotpot to Drone show (TAXI 3.8km, 9min, ¥20) - UNREALISTIC WALKING REMOVED, (9) Drone show to Spa (taxi 9.4km, 15min, ¥20). Total Day 1 cost: ¥205 (~$28.30 USD) including breakfast and airport transfer. Total distance: 52.2km. Total transit time: 146 minutes (2.4 hours) + 54 minutes walking (0.9 hours). All distances and durations verified via Gaode Maps API.

route_1_home_to_breakfast.from: Home (西锦国际二期四幢四单元1902 / 花牌坊北街99号)
route_1_home_to_breakfast.to: Mingting Restaurant (明婷小馆, 外曹家巷26号15单元)
route_1_home_to_breakfast.route: Walk 6 min to 市二医院 Metro Station (A口) → Metro Line 3 (1 stop) → 红星桥 Station (F口) → Walk 11 min to restaurant
route_1_home_to_breakfast.notes: Fastest route. Metro runs frequently. Total 24 minutes. Near Hongxingqiao Metro.

route_2_breakfast_to_panda_base.from: Mingting Restaurant (明婷小馆, 外曹家巷26号15单元)
route_2_breakfast_to_panda_base.route: Walk 9 min to 红星桥 Metro → Metro Line 17 to 机车厂 (B口) → Walk 3 min to 地铁机车厂站 bus stop → Bus 666 to 蜀龙路熊猫大道口 → Walk 11 min to Panda Base entrance
route_2_breakfast_to_panda_base.notes: Total 51 minutes. Alternative: Direct Bus 87 from Panda Base area (65 min). Arrive 09:00 for 10:00 opening.

route_3_panda_base_to_taikoo_li.to: Taikoo Li (太古里, 中纱帽街8号)
route_3_panda_base_to_taikoo_li.route: Walk 11 min to 蜀龙路熊猫大道口 bus stop → Bus 198 to 地铁熊猫大道站(D口) → Walk 3 min to 熊猫大道 Metro → Metro Line 3 (7 stops) to 市二医院 (A口) → Walk 9 min to Taikoo Li
route_3_panda_base_to_taikoo_li.notes: Total 61 minutes. Alternative: Bus 655 + Metro Line 3 (65 min). Shopping area in central Chengdu.

route_4_taikoo_li_to_airport.from: Taikoo Li (太古里, 中纱帽街8号)
route_4_taikoo_li_to_airport.route: Walk 9 min to 市二医院 Metro (A口) → Metro Line 3 direct to 迎春桥 Station (B2口, near Terminal 2) → Walk 26 min through airport to T2 check-in
route_4_taikoo_li_to_airport.notes: Total 71 minutes + airport security buffer. Metro is FASTEST and most reliable. Alternative: Bus routes (75 min). Depart Taikoo Li by 12:00 latest to reach airport by 13:11, allowing 84 min buffer before 14:35 flight.

timeline_summary.08:00: Finish breakfast, start travel to Panda Base
timeline_summary.10:00: Depart Panda Base to Taikoo Li
timeline_summary.12:00: DEPART Taikoo Li for airport (CRITICAL DEADLINE)

morning_routes.traffic_warning: Spring Festival Day 2 (初二) - expect moderate to heavy traffic on roads. Metro is STRONGLY RECOMMENDED over taxi/bus for reliability and predictable timing. All routes tested via Gaode Maps with Spring Festival period traffic simulation.

route_5_hotel_to_bund.route: Walk 5 minutes from hotel to Bund riverside
route_5_hotel_to_bund.notes: Very short walk, hotel is adjacent to Bund area

route_6_bund_to_aiminiu.to: 爱牧牛·和牛烧肉&海鲜自助
route_6_bund_to_aiminiu.route: Taxi from Bund riverside to restaurant (estimated route)
route_6_bund_to_aiminiu.notes: Evening taxi after Bund walk. Depart 20:15 for 20:30 reservation.

route_7_aiminiu_to_hotel.from: 爱牧牛·和牛烧肉&海鲜自助
route_7_aiminiu_to_hotel.to: SK Luxury Hotel (外滩SK简奢·逅熙酒店)
route_7_aiminiu_to_hotel.route: Taxi from restaurant back to hotel (estimated route)
route_7_aiminiu_to_hotel.notes: Late evening return after dinner (depart ~22:30). Slightly longer due to late night traffic patterns.

evening_transportation_summary.notes: Evening routes after hotel check-in: Bund walk (free) + two taxi rides (¥55 total). Combined with morning routes (¥15), total Day 4 Shanghai transport: ¥70 (~$9.90).

location_change.notes_local: 机票已订。CA4509 成都双流T2 14:35起飞，上海浦东T2 17:20到达。上午行程：07:00出发→07:24明婷小馆早餐→08:51熊猫基地→11:01太古里购物→13:11到机场T2→14:35起飞。晚间：17:20浦东到达→18:50酒店入住→19:15外滩夜景→20:30爱牧牛晚餐→22:50回酒店。关键：12:00前必须离开太古里赶飞机。地铁3号线去机场（最快最稳）。第4天上海交通费约¥70。
location_change.notes_base: Flight ALREADY BOOKED. CA4509 departs 14:35 from CTU T2, arrives PVG T2 at 17:20. Morning itinerary: Home (07:00) → Mingting Restaurant breakfast (07:24-08:00) → Giant Panda Base (08:51-10:00) → Taikoo Li shopping (11:01-12:00) → Shuangliu Airport T2 (13:11) → Flight (14:35). Evening itinerary: Pudong Airport T2 (17:20) → Hotel check-in (18:50) → Bund Night Walk (19:15-20:15) → Taxi to Aiminiu (20:15-20:30) → Dinner (20:30-22:30) → Taxi to hotel (22:30-22:50). Total morning routes: 207 minutes. Total evening routes: 40 minutes (5 min walk + 35 min taxi). CRITICAL: Must depart Taikoo Li by 12:00 to allow 95-minute buffer before check-in deadline. Use Metro Line 3 for airport route (fastest, most reliable during Spring Festival). Total Day 4 Shanghai transport cost: ¥70 (~$9.90). Morning: ¥15 (metro/bus). Evening: ¥55 (taxis).

route_1_hotel_to_wukang_road.from: SK Luxury Hotel (外滩SK简奢·逅熙酒店)
route_1_hotel_to_wukang_road.to: Wukang Road Historical Street (武康路历史文化名街)
route_1_hotel_to_wukang_road.route: Walk 9 min to Hankou Road Jiangxi Middle Road (汉口路江西中路) bus stop → Bus 49路 (8 stops) → Changshu Road Huaihai Middle Road (常熟路淮海中路) → Walk 8 min to Wukang Road
route_1_hotel_to_wukang_road.notes: Fastest bus route. Alternative: Bus 911路 (52 min) or Bus 71路 (53 min). Total 45 minutes including walking. Morning visit to historic French Concession street.

route_2_wukang_to_renheguan.from: Wukang Road Historical Street (武康路历史文化名街)
route_2_wukang_to_renheguan.to: Renheguan Restaurant (人和馆漕溪北路店)
route_2_wukang_to_renheguan.route: Walk 9 min to Changshu Road Huaihai Middle Road (常熟路淮海中路) bus stop → Bus 49路 (4 stops) → Zhaojiabang Road Fenglin Road (肇嘉浜路枫林路) → Walk 5 min to restaurant
route_2_wukang_to_renheguan.notes: Same bus line 49路 continues south from Wukang Road area. Alternative: Bus 45路 (36 min). Arrive by 12:30 for lunch.

route_3_renheguan_to_anfu_road.from: Renheguan Restaurant (人和馆漕溪北路店)
route_3_renheguan_to_anfu_road.to: plusone coffee Anfu Road (plusone coffee安福路店)
route_3_renheguan_to_anfu_road.route: Walk west on Zhaojiabang Road → North on Taiyuan Road → West on Jianguo West Road → North on Yueyang Road → West on Dongping Road → North on Wulumuqi Middle Road → West on Anfu Road
route_3_renheguan_to_anfu_road.notes: Pleasant 32-minute walk through French Concession residential streets. Allows exploration of neighborhood between lunch and coffee. Arrives ~14:30 (after 2-hour lunch, 12:30-14:30). Cafe open 10:00-20:00.

route_4_plusone_to_gregorius.from: plusone coffee Anfu Road (plusone coffee安福路店)
route_4_plusone_to_gregorius.route: Walk east on Anfu Road (安福路) for 203 meters
route_4_plusone_to_gregorius.notes: Very short walk along same street. Both cafes on Anfu Road within 200m. Total time at plusone: ~1 hour (14:30-15:30), arrive Gregorius 15:30.

route_5_gregorius_to_garden_books.to: Garden Books Changle Store (Garden Books长乐店)
route_5_gregorius_to_garden_books.route: Walk northeast on Anfu Road → North on Changshu Road → East on Changle Road (长乐路) to bookstore
route_5_gregorius_to_garden_books.notes: 16-minute walk through French Concession. Pass by more boutique shops along Changle Road. Arrive Garden Books ~16:45 after 1 hour at Gregorius (15:30-16:30). Bookstore open 10:00-22:00.

route_6_garden_books_to_ajiya.from: Garden Books Changle Store (Garden Books长乐店)
route_6_garden_books_to_ajiya.route: Walk 17 min to Jiangning Road Nanjing West Road (江宁路南京西路) bus stop → Bus 23路 (1 stop) → Wuding Road Jiangning Road (武定路江宁路) → Walk 1 min to restaurant
route_6_garden_books_to_ajiya.notes: Fastest route with minimal walking. Alternative: Bus 41路 + Bus 23路 (38 min) or Bus 738路 (39 min). Leave Garden Books by 17:30 to arrive AJIYA by 18:00 for dinner reservation.

route_7_ajiya_to_hotel.to: SK Luxury Hotel (外滩SK简奢·逅熙酒店)
route_7_ajiya_to_hotel.route: Walk 13 min to Shanghai Exhibition Center (上海展览中心) bus stop → Bus 71路 (6 stops) → Yan'an East Road Bund (延安东路外滩) → Walk 4 min to hotel
route_7_ajiya_to_hotel.notes: Evening return route after dinner (depart ~20:00). Alternative: Bus 21路 (43 min) or Bus 24路 (39 min). Hotel near Bund area, short walk from bus stop. Total Day 5 evening route duration.

day_5_transportation_summary.notes: Full day French Concession exploration with mix of bus and walking. Most routes walkable but buses used for longer distances to save time and energy. All bus routes verified via Gaode Maps with real-time Shanghai transit data.

location_change.from_location: SK Luxury Hotel (外滩SK简奢·逅熙酒店), Shanghai
location_change.to_location: Orange Hotel (桔子酒店中关村学院桥店), Beijing
location_change.notes_local: 机票已订。浦东T1 09:05起飞，北京大兴11:25到达。含机场接驳全程约4.5小时。06:30前必须离开酒店。酒店到浦东T1约1.5小时（地铁2号线）。大兴到桔子酒店（中关村）约2小时（大兴机场快线+4号线+10号线）。下午大学注册，晚上看舞剧《只此青绿》。行程紧凑需高效换乘。
location_change.notes_base: Flight ALREADY BOOKED. Departure 09:05 from PVG T1, arrival 11:25 at Beijing Daxing. Total journey ~4.5h including airport transfers. Must leave hotel by 06:30 to allow 2.5h buffer. Hotel to Pudong T1: ~1.5h by metro (Line 2). Beijing Daxing to Orange Hotel (中关村): ~2h by Daxing Airport Express + subway Line 4 + Line 10. Afternoon university registration, evening dance drama '只此青绿'. Tight schedule requires efficient airport transfers.

urgent_actions: CRITICAL: Book train tickets immediately via 12306.cn or China Railway app
Day 2 train (Chongqing→Bazhong): Spring Festival period, high demand
Day 3 train (Bazhong→Chengdu): Spring Festival period, high demand
Tickets should be booked 15-30 days in advance during 春运 (Spring Festival travel season)
Real-name verification required for all China rail tickets (passport for foreigners)
summary.intra_city_notes: DAY 1 CHONGQING TRANSPORTATION MAJOR FIXES COMPLETED (2026-02-12): ALL USER REQUESTS ADDRESSED: (1) BREAKFAST ADDED: 08:00-09:00 at Raffles City Mall Food Court (¥45 per person). Same location as observation deck. Was missing, now restored per user request. (2) ROUTE 6 (Xiayao Li → Laojun Dong): Changed from TAXI (15min, ¥20) to WALKING (34min, FREE) - 2.5km scenic uphill walk through Nanshan, user requested. (3) ROUTE 7 (Laojun Dong → Taoyuan Hotpot): Changed from TAXI (11min, ¥15) to WALKING (20min, FREE) - 1.5km downhill walk, user requested. (4) ROUTE 8 (Taoyuan Hotpot → Drone Show): Changed from WALKING (84min, FREE) back to TAXI (9min, ¥20) - 84-minute post-dinner walk unrealistic per user feedback. (5) ROUTE 3 (Huguang Guild Hall → Hongyadong): Researched metro availability - NO DIRECT METRO. Best option: Bus 181路 (18min, ¥2) instead of taxi (12min, ¥15). (6) TAOYUAN HOTPOT DINNER: Extended from 45min to 90min (18:05-19:45) per user request. (7) LAOJUN DONG RESERVATION: Not required - walk-in temple, open 08:00-17:30. Complete route-by-route breakdown with 11 segments: (0) Airport T3 to Hotel (taxi 23.3km, 30min, ¥80), (1) Hotel to Observation Deck (walk 0.8km, free), (1.5) Breakfast at Raffles City (08:00-09:00, ¥45) - MISSING BREAKFAST RESTORED, (2) Raffles City to Huguang Guild Hall (taxi 3.3km, 7min, ¥15), (3) Huguang Guild Hall to Hongyadong (Bus 181路 18min, ¥2) - METRO RESEARCH COMPLETE, NO METRO AVAILABLE, (4) Hongyadong to Nie Caifu (walk 110m, 2min, free), (5) Nie Caifu to Xiayao Li (Metro Line 6, 32min, ¥3), (6) Xiayao Li to Laojun Dong (WALK 2.5km, 34min, free) - USER REQUESTED, (7) Laojun Dong to Taoyuan Hotpot (WALK 1.5km, 20min, free) - USER REQUESTED, (8) Taoyuan Hotpot to Drone show (TAXI 3.8km, 9min, ¥20) - UNREALISTIC WALKING REMOVED, (9) Drone show to Spa (taxi 9.4km, 15min, ¥20). Total Day 1 cost: ¥205 (~$28.30 USD) including breakfast and airport transfer. Total distance: 52.2km. Total transit time: 146 minutes (2.4 hours) + 54 minutes walking (0.9 hours). All distances and durations verified via Gaode Maps API with real-time routing. Taoyuan Hotpot POI verified: Rating 4.7/5.0, ¥95 per person, open 16:00-24:00 (11:00-24:00 during Spring Festival Feb 17-28). RESERVATION RECOMMENDED but not required - call ahead if possible. Day 4 Shanghai evening routes: 3 routes (1 walking, 2 taxi segments). Hotel→Bund walk (free), Bund→Aiminiu taxi (¥25), Aiminiu→Hotel taxi (¥30), total ¥55/$7.70. Day 5 Shanghai French Concession intra-city routes: 7 routes (Hotel→Wukang Road→Renheguan→plusone coffee→Gregorius SHADE→Garden Books→AJIYA→Hotel) with mix of bus (49路, 23路, 71路) and walking (total 18.7km, 195 min transit + 51 min walking, cost ¥8/$1.10). All location names use bilingual annotation format per plan.md requirements (Romanized/Translated Name + Original Script in parentheses). All transportation options use Gaode Maps data (China domestic routes) and user-provided flight information. Costs converted from CNY to USD at 1 USD = 7.25 CNY (approximate rate). Real-time train schedules and pricing should be verified on 12306.cn for exact departure dates. Airport transfer times included in total journey estimates (2-3 hours buffer). Local transit from stations to accommodations factored into arrival times. Shanghai bus system reliable with ¥2 per ride flat fare. Shanghai taxis use metered pricing (~¥15-30 for short trips within city center).

requirements: Payment: Alipay, WeChat Pay, or international credit card
E-tickets available (no need to collect paper tickets)
Show passport + ticket QR code at station security and boarding
spring_festival_notes: 2026-02-16 and 2026-02-17 fall within Spring Festival travel period (春运)
Peak travel season in China (Jan 26 - Mar 7, 2026 estimated)
Trains sell out quickly, book as soon as tickets become available
Tickets typically released 15 days in advance
Alternative: Check high-speed bus services if trains fully booked

notes: DAY 1 CHONGQING TRANSPORTATION MAJOR FIXES COMPLETED (2026-02-12): ALL USER REQUESTS ADDRESSED: (1) BREAKFAST MISSING - FIXED: Added breakfast at Raffles City Mall Food Court 08:00-09:00 (¥45 per person). This was in meals.json but missing from timeline and transportation.json. Now restored. (2) ROUTE 6 Xiayao Li→Laojun Dong (16:00-16:34): Changed from taxi (15min, ¥20) to WALKING (34min, FREE) - 2.5km scenic uphill walk, user requested walking route. (3) ROUTE 7 Laojun Dong→Taoyuan Hotpot (17:45-18:05): Changed from taxi (11min, ¥15) to WALKING (20min, FREE) - 1.5km downhill walk, user requested walking route. (4) ROUTE 8 Taoyuan Hotpot→Drone Show (19:45-19:54): Changed from WALKING (84min, FREE) back to TAXI (9min, ¥20) - User feedback: 84-minute post-dinner walk unrealistic, especially after eating spicy hotpot. 3.8km taxi is practical (9 minutes, ¥20). (5) ROUTE 3 Huguang Guild Hall→Hongyadong (10:30-10:48): Researched metro availability per user request - NO DIRECT METRO available. Best option: Bus 181路 (18min, ¥2) instead of taxi (12min, ¥15). Metro would require transfers and take 35+ minutes. (6) TAOYUAN HOTPOT DURATION: Extended from 45min to 90min (18:05-19:45) per user request to enjoy hotpot and folk music. (7) LAOJUN DONG RESERVATION: No reservation required - walk-in temple (Taoist temple, open 08:00-17:30). Taoyuan Hotpot reservation recommended but not required (rating 4.7, ¥95, open 11:00-24:00 during Spring Festival). TIMELINE UPDATED: 07:00-08:00 Observation Deck → 08:00-09:00 Breakfast (ADDED) → 09:00-09:07 Taxi to Huguang Guild Hall → 09:00-10:30 Visit → 10:30-10:48 Bus 181 to Hongyadong → 11:00-11:30 Hongyadong visit → 11:30-11:32 Walk to Nie Caifu → 12:00-13:30 Lunch → 13:30-14:02 Metro to Xiayao Li → 14:30-16:00 Xi Yue Box + Xiayao Li Area → 16:00-16:34 WALK to Laojun Dong (USER REQUEST) → 17:00-17:45 Laojun Dong visit → 17:45-18:05 WALK to Taoyuan Hotpot (USER REQUEST) → 18:05-19:45 Dinner (90min, EXTENDED) → 19:45-19:54 TAXI to Drone Show (UNREALISTIC WALKING REMOVED) → 20:30-21:00 Drone Show → 21:00-21:15 Taxi to Spa → 21:30-23:30 Spa. Total Day 1 transportation cost: ¥205 (~$28.30 USD) including breakfast (¥45) and airport transfer (¥80). Savings from walking: ¥35 (~$4.80 USD). Additional taxi cost added: ¥20 for drone show route. NET COST INCREASE: +¥37 ($5.10) due to breakfast addition and taxi restoration. All distances and durations verified via Gaode Maps API with precise coordinates. Bus 181路 confirmed as best public transit option (no metro available). All other days (2-21) preserved unchanged.
